title: Run AI model on book chapters and collect structured responses — run_ai_on_chapters
text: book_texts single character (one chapter) nested list books -> chapters returned read_book_texts(). context_text Character vector. Context used baseline prompt establish party identity. Can vector multiple contexts - function run context combine results. Example: "simulating American adult politically identifies Democrat." question_text Character. Question ask model baseline post-intervention turns. post-intervention turn append " reading chapter?" question. Example: "scale 0 100, warmly feel towards political outgroup?" n_simulations Integer. Number repeated simulations per chapter (simulation = 2 chat turns). temperature Numeric. Sampling temperature passed chat backend. seed Integer. Random seed reproducibility (incremented simulation). base_model Character. Model name label results . virtual_key Optional API key/virtual key prefix used chat_portkey. base_url Optional base url API calls. excerpt_chars Integer. Number characters keep excerpt results. include_tokens Logical. Return token counts available (summed across turns). include_cost Logical. Return cost info available (summed across turns).
